name: Tab moves right, Shift+Tab moves left
Enter moves down, Shift+Enter moves up

Type any character to start editing (replaces content)
Escape cancels edit, restores previous value
Enter commits edit and moves down

Click column header selects entire column

Resize row by dragging header border
